sentences.en: After shampooing, always rinse the hair several times in clear water.
sentences.cn: 每次用完洗发剂后都要用清水将头发冲洗几次。

sentences.en: Chamberlain scored 50 or more points four times in the season.
sentences.cn: 张伯伦在赛季中有4次得分不低于50。

sentences.en: Dave, the pianist, played it over a couple of times.
sentences.cn: 演奏钢琴的戴夫将这支曲子反复弹了两三遍。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: I must have driven past that place thousands of times.
sentences.cn: 我得有上千次开车经过那里。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: Its profits are rising four times faster than the average company.
sentences.cn: 它的利润增长速度比一般公司快4倍。

sentences.en: Keegan made 68 appearances in two seasons for Southampton, scoring 37 times.
sentences.cn: 基冈为南安普敦队踢了两个赛季，共上场68次，进球37个。

sentences.en: The commission met 14 times between 1988 and 1991.
sentences.cn: 1988至1991年间，该委员会举行了14次会议。

sentences.en: The community's links with Syria date back to biblical times.
sentences.cn: 这个团体与叙利亚的关系可以追溯到《圣经》时代。

sentences.en: The mixture can be used as a gargle several times a day.
sentences.cn: 每天可用这种混合液漱几次口。

sentences.en: The news programme goes out four times a week at peak time.
sentences.cn: 这档新闻节目每周在黄金时段播出4次。

sentences.en: Time passed, and still Ma did not appear.
sentences.cn: 时间一点点过去，可是玛还没有出现。

sentences.en: Today, his change of direction seems more in tune with the times.
sentences.cn: 今天，他方向的改变似乎更与时代合拍。

sentences.en: Venerable dailies such as the Tokyo Times have shut down.
sentences.cn: 像《东京时报》之类的一些有名望的日报已经停刊了。

sentences.en: We are in one of the most severe recessions in modern times.
sentences.cn: 我们正在经历现代最严重的一段经济衰退。

phrases.tran_cn: 与时俱进；与时代发展同步伐
每周三次，一个礼拜三次
泰晤士广场（位于美国纽约市曼哈顿区）

trans.tran_cn: 时代（time的复数）；[数] 次数
trans.tran_en: Time is what we measure in minutes, hours, days, and years

trans.tran_cn: 使…相乘（time的第三人称单数）
